{"id":385480891,"question_id":3,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"4 years, 5 months","timestamp":1598240444,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"40 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/385480891/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Longest Substring Without Repeating Characters","memory":"8.6 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int lengthOfLongestSubstring(string s) {\n\t\tunordered_map<char, int> map;\n\t\tint res = 0;\n\t\tint j=0;\n\t\tfor (int i=0; i<s.length(); ++i) {\n\t\t\tif (map.find(s[i]) != map.end()) {\n\t\t\t\tj= max(j, map[s[i]]+1);\n\t\t\t}\n\t\t\tmap[s[i]]=i;\n\t\t\tres=max(res, i-j+1);\n\t\t}\n\t\treturn res;\n\t\t\t\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"longest-substring-without-repeating-characters","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
